trees.description: Improve your shop experience and convenience

nodes.title: Shop App
nodes.description: Unlock Phone App to view jobs and manage your shop
nodes.detailedDescription:
Stay connected to the shop without sitting at the terminal.

**Phone App**
- Browse or accept jobs remotely
- Manage tech assignments

nodes.title: Kit Storage
nodes.detailedDescription:
Keep a deeper library of proven setups.

**Per Level**
- +2 tuning kit save slots
- Reapply repeat builds without rebuilding from memory

nodes.title: More Complicated
nodes.description: Get more difficult and higher rewarding jobs
nodes.detailedDescription:
Invite tougher customers who pay better.

**Effects**
- Access higher difficulty job listings
- Expect stricter goals but noticeably larger rewards

nodes.title: No Hard Feelings
nodes.detailedDescription:
Walking away hurts less.

**Per Level**
- Abandonment fee reduced by 5%
- Safer to drop unprofitable or impossible jobs

nodes.title: Brand Recognition
nodes.description: Receive an increased job offer chance of a specific brand
nodes.detailedDescription:
Lean into a favorite manufacturer.

**Choose a brand**
- Increased chance of offers from that brand
- Familiar chassis = faster turnarounds and better margins

nodes.title: Race Recognition
nodes.description: Receive an increased job offer chance of a specific race type
nodes.detailedDescription:
Market your specialty to race organizers.

**Pick a discipline**
- More offers for track, drag, or short-track builds
- Aligns work with the events you run best

nodes.title: Kit Storage
nodes.detailedDescription:
Extend your setup archive even further.

**Per Level**
- +2 additional kit slots beyond the first tier
- Maintain variants for trims, weather, and track types

nodes.title: More Complicated
nodes.description: Get more difficult and higher rewarding jobs
nodes.detailedDescription:
Final tier of elite clientele.

**What Changes**
- Opens the hardest, highest-paying contracts
- Expect strict parts lists, tuning targets, and deadlines

nodes.title: Personal Use
nodes.description: Tune personal vehicles in the shop
nodes.detailedDescription:
Bring your own cars onto the equipment.

**Benefits**
- Personal vehicles can use every unlocked upgrade and tool
- Enjoy the same part discounts and towing perks
- Build wild personal projects without leaving the shop

nodes.title: I Give Up
nodes.description: You can abandon jobs for free
nodes.detailedDescription:
Quit without a bill.

**Effect**
- Abandon any accepted job for free
- Evaluate risky offers with zero downside

nodes.title: Shop Techs
nodes.description: Hire workers to automate job completion
nodes.detailedDescription:
Hire automated builders to keep jobs moving.

**Cycle**
- Build cost = 30% of the job payout
- Success on first run: pay build + 5% of net profit
- Failed run triggers a rebuild at 1.25x cost
- Total failure = build + abandonment cost, no tech cut

**Extras**
- FRE runs add winnings to rewards or soften losses
- Each tech costs $2,500 per 30 minutes of uptime

nodes.title: Faster Techs
nodes.detailedDescription:
Train techs to wrap builds sooner.

**Per Level**
- Build time -5%
- Faster turnover and less queueing

nodes.title: Reliable Techs
nodes.description: Higher chance of success. +5% Per Upgrade
nodes.detailedDescription:
Improve first-attempt reliability.

**Per Level**
- +5% chance of meeting the target time on run #1
- Fewer rebuilds and downtime

nodes.title: Event Retries
nodes.description: Techs will run the event +1 more times after build
nodes.detailedDescription:
Give techs more chances to nail the run.

**Per Level**
- +1 additional event attempt after the build
- Each retry adds a 2.5 minute cooldown before the next run

nodes.title: Manager
nodes.detailedDescription:
Put job triage on autopilot.

**Manager**
- Assigns idle techs every 30 minutes
- Costs $5,000 per 30 minutes to keep on payroll
- Keeps you free to focus on other tasks

nodes.title: Manager Speed
nodes.detailedDescription:
Make the manager react quicker.

**Per Level**
- Assignment interval -2 minutes (down to 10)
- Techs sit idle for less time between jobs

nodes.title: Faster Techs II
nodes.detailedDescription:
Advanced training for veteran crews.

**Per Level**
- Additional 5% reduction to build time
- Keeps up with heavier job volume

nodes.title: Smart Techs
nodes.detailedDescription:
Teach techs to waste fewer parts.

**Per Level**
- Build cost -5%
- Higher profit per automated run

nodes.title: Skilled Techs
nodes.description: Can accept jobs Higher of Tier +1
nodes.detailedDescription:
Raise the ceiling on their capabilities.

**Per Level**
- Techs can accept jobs one tier higher
- Unlock higher-paying automated contracts

nodes.title: General Manager
nodes.detailedDescription:
Promote to an instant-response general manager.

**Effect**
- Jobs are assigned the moment a tech frees up
- Operating cost rises to $25,000 per 30 minutes

nodes.title: Perfect Techs
nodes.detailedDescription:
Automation endgame.

**Effect**
- Techs never fail and always meet the target on the first run
- Rebuilds, retries, and abandonment risks disappear

trees.description: Upgrade your shop facilities and capabilities

nodes.title: Towing
nodes.detailedDescription:
Bring cars home instantly.

**Effect**
- Tow vehicles back to the shop after remote drives
- Skip the return trip and get straight to work

nodes.title: Lift #2
nodes.detailedDescription:
Add another lift bay.

**Effect**
- +1 simultaneous worker / pulled-out vehicle
- Each lift costs $5,000 per 30 minutes to operate

nodes.title: Dyno
nodes.description: Unlock dynamic Power and Weight stats in shop
nodes.detailedDescription:
Drop a dyno next to the lifts.

**Features**
- Live power and weight stats inside the shopping cart
- Preview how part combos change performance before buying

nodes.title: Part Suppliers
nodes.detailedDescription:
Negotiate volume pricing.

**Per Level**
- Part cost -5%
- Better margin on every build

nodes.title: Part Reseller
nodes.detailedDescription:
Flip take-off parts for more.

**Per Level**
- Resale value +5%
- Recover extra cash when swapping builds

nodes.title: Bigger Books
nodes.detailedDescription:
Hold more contracts at once.

**Base Limit**
- Start with 2 active job slots

**Per Level**
- +1 active job slot (2 + level)
- Prevent idle techs while waiting on parts or timers

nodes.title: Lift #3
nodes.detailedDescription:
Fill the shop with a third lift.

**Effect**
- +1 worker slot / pulled vehicle (up to three)
- Each lift still costs $5,000 per 30 minutes

nodes.title: Marketing
nodes.detailedDescription:
Keep the phones ringing.

**Per Level**
- Job generation speed +25%
- Higher throughput for every tree

nodes.title: XP Gain
nodes.detailedDescription:
Get upgrades faster.

**Per Level**
- XP gain +25%
- Unlock the late-tree upgrades sooner

nodes.title: Solar Panels
nodes.detailedDescription:
Power the business with sun and cut every bill.

**Effect**
- Removes operating costs for lifts, techs, managers, and general manager
- Profit stays in your pocket

nodes.title: Lift #4
nodes.detailedDescription:
Max out the floor space.

**Effect**
- +1 more lift for a total of four worker slots
- Each lift continues to cost $5,000 per 30 minutes
